name: Raspberry Pi Multi Purpose App
description: A Front end with a API to control power outlets, rfid power outlets, measure temperature and more

scripts.postinstall: composer install; composer update; if [ ! -f etc/database-connections.json ]; then cp etc/conf_sample/database-connections.json.sample etc/database-connections.json; fi; if [ ! -f etc/core-widget.definition.json ]; then cp etc/conf_sample/core-widget.definition.json.sample etc/core-widget.definition.json; fi;

author: Wesley Dekkers
